sourcesContent:
import { TAX_KIND } from 'shared/catalogs'

// Issuer keys
export const VOUCHER_TYPE = 'voucher_type'
export const INVOICE_KEY = 'invoice'
export const SERIES_KEY = 'series'
export const FOLIO_KEY = 'folio'
export const ISSUE_DATE_KEY = 'issue_date'
export const EXCHANGE_RATE_KEY = 'exchange_rate'
export const CURRENCY_KEY = 'currency'
export const BRANCH_KEY = 'branch'
export const COMMENTS_KEY = 'comments'
export const TIME_KEY = 'time'
export const ORIGINAL_DATE_KEY = 'original_datetime'
export const TAX_CLASSIFICATION_KEY = 'tax_classification'
export const ISSUER_MG_KEY = 'issuer_mg'

// recipient keys
export const RECIPIENT_KEY = 'recipient_mg'
export const RECIPIENT_ID_KEY = 'id'
export const CFDI_USAGE_KEY = 'cfdi_usage'
export const PAYMENT_FORM_KEY = 'payment_form'
export const PAYMENT_METHOD_KEY = 'payment_method'
export const FISCAL_ENTITY = 'entity_register_id'
export const FISCAL_RESIDENCY = 'tax_residency'

// Charges

export const CHARGE_KEY = 'concept'
export const AMOUNT_KEY = 'quantity'
export const DESCRIPTION_KEY = 'description'
export const UNITY_KEY = 'unity_code'
export const PRICE_KEY = 'unit_price_cents'
export const DISCOUNT_KEY = 'discount_cents'
export const TOTAL_KEY = 'total_cents'
export const IDENTIFY_NUM_KEY = 'identify_num'
export const PRODUCT_SERVICE_CODE_KEY = 'product_service_code'
export const TAX_DETAIL_KEY = 'li_tax_detail_mg'
export const BEFORE_TAX_TOTAL_KEY = 'total'
export const CUSTOM_IVA_TRANSLATED = 'custom_iva_translated'
export const TAX_AMOUNT_CENTS_KEY = 'amount_cents'
export const TAX_RETAINED_KEY = 'li_retained_tax_mgs'
export const TAX_TRANSFERRED_KEY = 'li_transferred_tax_mgs'

export const TAX_TAX_NAME_KEY = 'tax_name'
export const TAX_RATE_KEY = 'rate'
export const TAX_FACTORY_TYPE_KEY = 'factory_type'
export const TAX_BASE_KEY = 'base'
export const RECIPE_DEFAULT_TAX = TAX_KIND[0]

export const REQUIRED_DECIMALS = 6

export const TAXES_BY_NAME = {
  ISR: { id: '001', retained: true, translated: false, reach: 'federal' },
  IVA: { id: '002', retained: true, translated: true, reach: 'federal' },
  IEPS: { id: '003', retained: true, translated: true, reach: 'federal' }
}
